content.rendered:
Directed by Vasan Bala

Written by Vasan Bala. Yogesh Chandekar

Cast Rajkummar Rao (Jayant Arkhedkar). Huma Qureshi (Monica Machado (as Huma S. Qureshi)). Radhika Apte (ACP Vijayashanti Naidu). Sikandar Kher (Nishikant Andhikari). Akansha Ranjan Kapoor (Nikki Adhikari). Zayn Marie Khan (Sarika Vartak). Sukant Goel (Gaurav More). Bagavathi Perumal (Arvind Manivannan (as Bucks)). Vijay Kenkre (Satyanarayan Adhikari). Devendra Dodke (Sub-inspector Shende). Shiva Rindani (Tamang Rana). Faisal Rashid (Faridi Baig). Shilpa Iyer (Savitri Manvannan). Gyanesh Upadhyay (TV News Anchor). Rashmi Phanse (Old Lady with Cataract). Pashv Nanda (Arvind’s Son). Panache Sahni (Arvind’s Daughter). Shiv Chauhan (Dev Prakash). Aaryan Menghji (Kid Jayant). Shalaka Pawar (Jayant’s Mother). Man Singh Karamati (Snake Charmer (as Maan Singh Karamati)). Pratik Nandkumar More (Raju – Leopard Guide). Hemant K Gaur (Hotel Receptionist (as Hemant Gaur)). Radhika Madan (Supri). Abhimanyu Dasani (Surya). Hemant Jha (EmCee at Unicorn Party). Chandramukh Pandey (Bike Guy at CST Station). Mahesh Baniya (Cycle Thief in Train). Akanksha Niranjan (Vinnie – Nikki’s Cousin (as Akansha Niranjan)). Swapnil Shakya (Pizza Delivery Boy)

Language Hindi

Producers Vishal Bajaj. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Kewal Garg. Pratik Nandkumar More. Nishant Pandey. Sarita Patil. Dikssha Jyote Routray. Sanjay Routray.

Production Matchbox Shots.
